title: Step 1: Aelric lights a torch and ente...
content:
Aelric: Aelric lights a torch and enters the forgotten crypt.
Narration: The ancient stone walls of the crypt echo with your footsteps as you aelric lights a torch and enters the forgotten crypt.. The air is thick with the weight of centuries, and shadows dance eerily in the torchlight.

title: Step 4: Aelric prepares for combat as ...
content:
Aelric: Aelric prepares for combat as a figure emerges.
Narration: Your muscles tense as you aelric prepares for combat as a figure emerges.. Years of training and countless battles have taught you to be ready for anything that might emerge from the darkness.

title: Step 5: He questions the figure about ...
content:
Aelric: He questions the figure about their purpose here.
Narration: You he questions the figure about their purpose here., your voice steady despite the tension. Your noble upbringing and diplomatic training guide your words as you seek to understand this mysterious encounter.
